# loggerer

```
$ npm install loggerer

import log from 'loggerer'

log('myLog')
// creates myLog.log inside of ${__dirname}

log.myLog('hello werld')
// myLog.log now contains data

Promise.all([ log('one'), log('two'), log('three') ]).then(logs => {
  logs.forEach(log => {
    log.append('footprint')
  })
})

log.myLog.reset()
// myLog.log is empty again...
```
